column4: USen

column3:
ありがとう……
お蔭で私の魂は解放されて
column4: Hello, Link.Because of your courage, my spirit is now free.

column3: このルッタも取り戻せた
column4: And Ruta, as well.
Thank you.
For I am now allowed by this freedom...
to be with you once again.
Since I am now a spirit,

column3: 魂だけになった今の私には
column4: my healing power would be wasted on me.
I have no need of it.
So therefore...I would like you to have it.

column3:
私の力……

ミファーの祈り……
column4: Please accept...Mipha's Grace.

column3: 昨日まで ずっと泣き続けてた……
column4: Yesterday, I was awash in a pool of tears.

column3:
魂だけになって ここに囚われて……
これから永遠に一人きりなんだって
column4:
I had nearly given up hope and resigned
myself to being trapped here, as a spirit,for the rest of eternity.
But now you're here.
All this time, my hope...

column3: こうして もう一度逢えた
column4: was to see you once more.

column3: そしてこれからは私の力が貴方の助けになれる
column4:
Promise me that you will not hesitate to call upon my
power if you ever find yourself in need.

column3:
だから……

もう大丈夫
column4: Knowing that...will let my spirit rest in peace.
I must go.

column3: 私とルッタの御役目を果たさなきゃ……
column4: Ruta and I have our roles to fulfill.

column3:
貴方が あの城でガノンと戦う時の援護……

今度は失敗しないから
column4:
We are both honored to be able to play
the role of support.We'll annihilate Ganon together.
Farewell.
Save her, Link.Save the princess...
Save Princess Zelda...
